name: srp-claude-code-marketplace
description: Internal SRP Claude Code plugins and MCP servers - monorepo structure

plugins.name: srp-allstaff
plugins.description: SRP AllStaff plugin - Lark/Feishu integration and office automation with Rube (Gmail, Slack, Calendar, Drive, GitHub, Linear, etc.)

plugins.name: srp-developer
plugins.description: SRP developer plugin - GitHub integration, GCP BigQuery access, Cloudflare Workers/Pages/R2/KV, Cloudflare Pages MCP, Ray Data processing, Slurm cluster management, and development tools

plugins.name: srp-devops
plugins.description: SRP DevOps plugin - Kubernetes management, cloud resource monitoring, and operations tools

plugins.name: srp-misc
plugins.description: SRP Misc plugin - 12306 train tickets, Variflight flight info, Airbnb listings, and Rednote (Xiaohongshu)

plugins.name: example-hello-world
plugins.description: Example plugin demonstrating basic Claude Code skill structure
